info.title: Ticketmaster (Independent Publisher)
info.description: Ticketmaster gives you access to millions of live event tickets and makes it easy to buy, sell, transfer, and get in - so you can get on with making memories that last.

get.description: Find events and filter your search by location, date, availability, and much more.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The page size of the response.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The filter for entities by their identifier.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword to search on.

parameters.name: attractionId
parameters.description: The filter by attraction identifier.

parameters.name: venueId
parameters.description: The filter by venue identifier.

parameters.name: postalCode
parameters.description: The filter by postal code or zipcode.

parameters.name: latlong
parameters.description: The filter for events by latitude and longitude. This filter is deprecated and may be removed in a future release, please use geoPoint instead.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius of the area in which we want to search for events.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: The unit of the radius.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The filter for entities by their primary source name or publishing source name.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: The filter by market identifier.

parameters.name: startDateTime
parameters.description: The filter with a start date after this date.

parameters.name: endDateTime
parameters.description: The filter with a start date before this date.

parameters.name: includeTBA
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include events with date to be announced (TBA).

parameters.name: includeTBD
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include events with a date to be defined (TBD).

parameters.name: includeTest
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include entities flagged as test in the response.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sorting order of the search result.

parameters.name: onsaleStartDateTime
parameters.description: The filter with onsale start date after this date.

parameters.name: onsaleEndDateTime
parameters.description: The filter with onsale end date before this date.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The filter by city.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The filter by country code.

parameters.name: stateCode
parameters.description: The filter by state code.

parameters.name: classificationName
parameters.description: The filter by classification name: name of any segment, genre, sub-genre, type, sub-type.

parameters.name: classificationId
parameters.description: The filter by classification identifier: identifier of any segment, genre, sub-genre, type, sub-type.

parameters.name: dmaId
parameters.description: The filter by DMA identifier.

parameters.name: localStartDateTime
parameters.description: The filter with event local start date time within this range.

parameters.name: localStartEndDateTime
parameters.description: The filter for events where event local start and end date overlap this range.

parameters.name: startEndDateTime
parameters.description: The filter for events where event start and end date overlap this range.

parameters.name: publicVisibilityStartDateTime
parameters.description: The filter for events with public visibility starting.

parameters.name: preSaleDateTime
parameters.description: The filter for events with a presale start and end that intersects with this range.

parameters.name: onsaleOnStartDate
parameters.description: The filter with onsale start date on this date.

parameters.name: onsaleOnAfterStartDate
parameters.description: The filter with onsale range within this date.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: The filter by collection identifier.

parameters.name: segmentId
parameters.description: The filter by segment identifier.

parameters.name: segmentName
parameters.description: The filter by segment name.

parameters.name: includeFamily
parameters.description: The filter by classification that are family-friendly.

parameters.name: promoterId
parameters.description: The filter by promoter identifier.

parameters.name: genreId
parameters.description: The filter by genre identifier.

parameters.name: subGenreId
parameters.description: The filter by sub-genre identifier.

parameters.name: typeId
parameters.description: The filter by type identifier.

parameters.name: subTypeId
parameters.description: The filter by sub-type identifier.

parameters.name: geoPoint
parameters.description: The filter for events by geoHash.

parameters.name: preferredCountry
parameters.description: The popularity boost by country, default is us.

parameters.name: includeSpellcheck
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include spell check suggestions in the response.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The filter for entities based on domains they are available on.

dateTBD.description: The date is to be determined.
dateTBD.title: Date TBD

dateTBA.description: The date is to be announced.
dateTBA.title: Date TBA

timeTBA.description: The date is to be announced.
timeTBA.title: Time TBA

get.description: Get details for a specific event using the unique identifier for the event. This includes the venue and location, the attraction(s), and the Ticketmaster Website URL for purchasing tickets for the event

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the event.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The filter for entities based on domains they are available on.

get.description: Get images for a specific event using the unique identifier for the event.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the event.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The filter for entities based on domains they are available on.

parameters.name: includeTest
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include entities flagged as test in the response.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The page size of the response.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sorting order of the search result.

parameters.name: classificationName
parameters.description: The filter for attractions by classification name.

parameters.name: classificationId
parameters.description: The filter for attractions by classification identifier.

get.description: Find venues and filter your search by name, and much more.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The filter for entities by their identifier.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword to search on.

parameters.name: latlong
parameters.description: The filter for venues by latitude and longitude. This filter is deprecated and may be removed in a future release, please use geoPoint instead.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius of the area in which we want to search for venues.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: The unit of the radius.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The filter for entities by their primary source name or publishing source name.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided.

parameters.name: includeTest
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include entities flagged as test in the response.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The page size of the response.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sorting order of the search result.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The filter for venues by country code.

parameters.name: stateCode
parameters.description: The filter by state / province code.

parameters.name: geoPoint
parameters.description: The filter for venues by geoHash.

parameters.name: preferredCountry
parameters.description: The popularity boost by country, default is us.

parameters.name: includeSpellcheck
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include spell check suggestions in the response.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The filter for entities based on domains they are available on.

get.description: Find search suggestions and filter your suggestions by location, source, etc.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword to search on.

parameters.name: latlong
parameters.description: The filter for events by latitude and longitude. This filter is deprecated and may be removed in a future release, please use geoPoint instead.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius of the area in which we want to search for events.

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: The unit of the radius.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The filter for entities by their primary source name or publishing source name.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided.

parameters.name: includeTBA
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include events with date to be announced (TBA).  Defaults to no if date parameter sent, yes otherwise.

parameters.name: includeTBD
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include events with a date to be defined (TBD). Defaults to no if date parameter sent, yes otherwise.

parameters.name: includeTest
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include entities flagged as test in the response.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of every entity returned in the response.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The filter suggestions by country code.

parameters.name: segmentId
parameters.description: The filter suggestions by segment identifier.

parameters.name: geoPoint
parameters.description: The filter for events by geoHash.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Which resources to include in the suggest response, defaults to all resources.

parameters.name: preferredCountry
parameters.description: The popularity boost by country, default is us.

parameters.name: startEndDateTime
parameters.description: The filter for events where event start and end date overlap this range.

parameters.name: localStartEndDateTime
parameters.description: The filter for events where event local start and end date overlap this range.

parameters.name: includeSpellcheck
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include spell check suggestions in the response.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The filter for entities based on domains they are available on.
